installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Gregtech New Horizons V2.8.X Install Script

: "${GTVERSION:=2.8.1}"  # default if not set
GTNH_ZIP_FILE="GT_New_Horizons_${GTVERSION}_Server_Java_17-25.zip"

# Ensure server directory exists
if [ ! -d /mnt/server ]; then
  mkdir -p /mnt/server
fi

BASE_DIR="/mnt/server"
BACKUP_DIR="$BASE_DIR/installtemp"

# Backup JourneyMapServer if it exists
if [ -d "$BASE_DIR/config/JourneyMapServer" ]; then
  echo "Backing up JourneyMapServer to $BACKUP_DIR..."
  mkdir -p "$BACKUP_DIR"
  cp -r "$BASE_DIR/config/JourneyMapServer" "$BACKUP_DIR/"
else
  echo "No JourneyMapServer directory found to back up."
fi

# Delete the old files/folders
echo "Deleting old files and folders..."
rm -rf \
  "$BASE_DIR/config" \
  "$BASE_DIR/libraries" \
  "$BASE_DIR/mods" \
  "$BASE_DIR/lwjgl3ify-forgePatches.jar" \
  "$BASE_DIR/java9args.txt"

# Install dependencies
if command -v apk >/dev/null 2>&1; then
  apk --no-cache add curl unzip
elif command -v apt >/dev/null 2>&1; then
  apt update && apt install -y curl unzip
fi

# Download and extract GTNH server
cd "$BASE_DIR"
echo "Downloading and extracting $GTNH_ZIP_FILE..."
curl -L -o "$GTNH_ZIP_FILE" "https://downloads.gtnewhorizons.com/ServerPacks/$GTNH_ZIP_FILE"
unzip -n "$GTNH_ZIP_FILE"
rm -f "$GTNH_ZIP_FILE" *.md *.bat

chmod +x startserver-java9.sh

# Restore backed-up files
if [ -d "$BACKUP_DIR" ]; then
  echo "Restoring files from installtemp..."
  cp -r "$BACKUP_DIR/JourneyMapServer" "$BASE_DIR/config"
else
  echo "No installtemp folder found — skipping restore."
fi

echo "Installation process is completed"
